value:
$WmMPID_レヴィン,ch06_16_Levn_M_Normal,Face|I'm nothing more than a wayward
bard.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face|Our destination is near. Let us rest
here this evening.$k$p

$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|Fjorm! Wake up!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Ylgr... What is it? What's wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face|I just wanted to say...thank you. I
heard you defend me to the people
from Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course I did. There's no need to
thank me for that. We're sisters. It's
only natural.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hee-hee. Still... You always look out
for me.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course I do.$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|And to think I repay your kindness
like this...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? *cough* *cough* Ylgr...
What... What are you...$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hee-hee. It's just a little medicine.
Smells terrible, doesn't it?$k$pOnce you inhale it, that's it... All the
strength leaves your body. I bet you
can't even lift that lance of yours...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*COUGH*$k$pYlgr? What...what are you doing?$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hee-hee. Oh, my dear, dear sister...
I'M the traitor.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! No...that's impossible...$k$p$WmMPID_ユルグ,ch00_15_Yurg_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I have to apologize. Because you
stuck up for me, after all.$k$pBut especially because you're going
to be tortured to death by King Surtr
like our poor dead sister, Gunnthrá.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Ylgr!$k$p$EFace_Pain|It can't be...
Ylgr... Don't...$k$pEveryone here is your ally! Your
friend!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Well said.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You're right, of course—and
$Nu has figured
out the truth.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|What? What are you talking about?
Tell me, $Nu...$k$pI...don't understand...$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$Fi2000|$EFace_Pain|What?$k$pA dream?$k$pHow exhausted am I that I would
have such an unsettling dream...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Fjorm.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Hríd?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's Ylgr.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The traitor is Ylgr... There can be no
mistake.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ylgr? No...$k$p$WmMPID_フリーズ,ch00_16_Freeze_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I understand how you must feel.
Come. I will explain.$k$pThis way...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|All right, Hríd.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Fjorm.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Prince Alfonse...$k$pPlease, listen. My brother has told
me—told me that the traitor—$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I know. I had my own suspicions. In
fact, I was sure of it. We were being
misled by our foes...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our foes?$k$p$Sbs150|
